keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promising to make the tax system fairer by giving everyone in Wales a permanent £700 tax cut.
Fully fund our plans and focus on getting the economy back on track.

issues.economy: Fully fund our plans and focus on getting the economy back on track.

leaflet.personalStatement: In recent months I have spoken to many local people and what strikes me is that we all want the same things – decent and affordable housing, clean crunchy roads and good schools.

contactInformation.address: Stuart R. Lloyd's 2 Castle Street Conwy LL32 8AY

images.caption: Sarah Green - Liberal Democrat Candidate for Arfon

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mentions that the area was once represented by the great Liberal Prime Minister, David Lloyd-George, who is referred to as someone that gave hope and pride to the people of Gwynedd and that it is time for the politicians in London to start listening to the people of Arfon again.
